ComicInfo.Title: Requiem, Part One
ComicInfo.Summary: BRAND NEW ARC! Great jumping-on point for new readers. One of the greatest horror franchises of all time returns, now under the control of its original creator! Clive Barker has touched Hellraiser only twice: once to write 'The Hellbound Heart', and once more to write and direct the original Hellraiser film. Now witness Barker's long-awaited return to tell a new chapter in the series' official continuity - a trajectory that will forever change the Cenobites...and Pinhead! Kirsty Cotton faces her greatest foes -- both new and old. And Pinhead is her greatest fear! But what could he have planned for her?
